title: simeple font some curves sans serif
author: roglioro

comments.content:
"furniture" looks like **[Microgramma Extended (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830051418/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=Microgramma%20D%20Extended%20-%20Medium&fid=4f18f8093767ff6a669f522b4e2b4b03&fsize=72&text=Herval%20furniture&wrap=2)**  
and "Herval" could easily be a modified Microgramma
I was about to shout Microgramma but I saw fvilanakis beat me to it!!!
